questiontext.text: Completa la siguiente frase: El río más largo del mundo es el [[1:SHORTANSWER:=Nilo]], y el segundo más largo es el [[2:SHORTANSWER:=Amazonas]].

Match the following cities with the correct state: 

* Charlotte: {1:MULTICHOICE:=North Carolina#OK~Georgia#Wrong} 

* Jacksonville: {1:MULTICHOICE:Arizona#Wrong~%100%Florida#OK} 

* Cleveland: {1:MULTICHOICE:=Ohio#OK~Kentucky#Wrong} 

* Green Bay: {1:MULTICHOICE:%0%California#Wrong~=Wisconsin#OK} 

The capital of Wales is {1:SHORTANSWER:%100%Cardiff#Congratulations! ~%50%Swansea#No, that is the second largest city in Wales (after Cardiff).~*#Wrong answer. The capital of Wales is Cardiff, of course.}.
